channel.title: Half Life 2 beta help
channel.description: i recently found HL2 beta anon (its funny how unfinished it is) and quite alot of maps dont work the list of maps ive tried that work are d1_trainstation_01 d1_trainstation_03 d1_trainstation_05 e3_techdemo_(all) except on 1 the new gman model doesnt appear its the HL1 model the whole time with no speech

item.title: Half Life 2 beta help
item.dc:creator: Black_Hawk
item.description:
kitor:

You’re wrong. Missing Information 1.6 was released a year ago >

That’s right, thank you! I saw “Released Dec 29, 2008” on ModDB -> Missing Information.

xalener thank you for good news!

Read full topic

item.title: Half Life 2 beta help
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
Well, it’s been 9 years. I think if you can’t find what you’re looking for, it may not be there. There was a beta renovation project to bring it up to modern standards, but I think they got absorbed into Missing Information.

Read full topic

item.description:
because the majority of the patches fix models and scripting and add maps not fix existing maps and im hoping somebody knows of a patch that does just that

Got ~1,400 WC maps, Some Nice Patches, this shit that shit. Give it a Try.

thats where i got the beta the air exchange campaign and majority of the patches i have now

item.title: Half Life 2 beta help
item.dc:creator: chrisc44890
item.description:
meh if i was good at mapping and coding i would attempt fixing it but i have no experience in either so even though i want to fix it and upload a nearly completely fixed release i couldnt however i fixed the axel project crash i was having by deleting the background files and also get the awesomely dark background to keep, still one thing though, downloaded a half life 1 map pack for it and dont know where to put it i tried both maps folders (the one in hl2 folder and the one in root folder) they dont show

Read full topic

https://www.love-tub.net/

item.title: Half Life 2 beta help
item.dc:creator: UltraPic
item.description:
Gregorovich!:

It is a Beta after all (ie. not ready for use by the general public).

It’s what valve had a week before release.

Read full topic

item.title: Half Life 2 beta help
item.dc:creator: FreemanBG
item.description:
hl2’s leak or “beta” is a lost cause.I had to learn that the hard way. I lost too much time on that (by trying to fix the leak. I even tried to join few mods). The dark industrial style really caught my heart. Your best bet is to join some surviving hl2 beta community and just stop looking for a way to fix it. Imo you better stop, because its like a drug.

Read full topic

item.title: Half Life 2 beta help
item.dc:creator: chrisc44890
item.description:
OrderOfDagon:

Isn’t there a mod that assorts it all together for you? Missing Information I think it’s called.
Or is this the dark beta that I love so much?

if you mean the beta with the air exchange campaign no, however i do have those maps due to a map pack this is the one after they scrapped the original darkness and started on the retail HL2 that we all know and most of us love also i would get Missing Info but it doesnt have the original maps theyre all modified for real source engine i like seeing how valve actually had it at first you would laugh at the original voice acting for the combines lol

Read full topic

item.title: Half Life 2 beta help
item.dc:creator: chrisc44890
item.description:
thanks for the list Dias (however a few of the listed non working maps work for me due to patches) and i need some other help, when i patch hl2 anon with the axel project which makes it even closer to the source engine the game stops responding when the menu comes up and just closes is there a fix for it? or is it compatibility issues with my computer

Read full topic

item.title: Half Life 2 beta help
item.dc:creator: Dias
item.description:
Missing Info also doesn’t have nearly as many of the maps from the leak, which is worth a look more for curiosity’s than anything for playable.

Read full topic

item.title: Half Life 2 beta help
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
Missing information is the Black Mesa of the beta, re-making and reconstructing an entire beta campaign from custom content and educated guesses on the original intended experience. This is the actual beta leak he’s talking about.

Read full topic

item.title: Half Life 2 beta help
item.dc:creator: Dias
item.description:
Maps that run:

background01 background05 background07 boxing c17_assault c17_plaza cafeteria d1_canals_02 d1_canals_end d1_tempcanals_02 d1_town_01 d1_town_02 d1_town_03 d1_trainstation_01 d1_trainstation_03 d1_under_01 d1_under_03 d2_coast_01 d2_coast_02 d2_coast_03 d2_coast_04 d2_coast_04_dx60 d2_coast_06 d2_coast_07 d2_coast_08 d2_depot_01 d2_depot_02 d2_depot_03 d2_prison_01 d2_prison_02 d2_prison_04 d2_prison_05 d2_prison_07 d3_c17_04 d3_c17_05 d3_c17_06a d3_c17_06b d3_c17_08 d3_c17_09 d3_c17_10a d3_c17_10b d3_c17_11 d3_c17_12 d3_c17_13 d3_c17_14 d3_canals_01 d3_canals_02 d3_citadel_05 d3_park_01 d3_under_01 devtest e3_Gurluas e3_c17_01 e3_c17_02 e3_end e3_hydra e3_industrial e3_ship e3_strider e3_techdemo_1 e3_techdemo_2 e3_techdemo_5 e3_techdemo_7 e3_terminal eli_lab perftest perftestb testroom_assault testroom_commander testroom_fastzombie testroom_standards testroom_terrainmorph trainingroom zoo_cable zoo_dust zoo_item zoo_lighting zoo_model zoo_particle zoo_portal zoo_portal2 zoo_shader zoo_weapon
Maps that don’t:

d1_canals_01 d1_quarry_01 d1_town_04 d1_town_05 d1_trainstation_02 d1_trainstation_05 d1_under_02 d1_under_04 d2_coast_05 d2_prison_03 d2_prison_06 d3_c17_03 d3_c17_07 d3_lab_01 d4_palace_01_beta_multiplay e3_bugbait e3_hl2logo e3_lab e3_lab_b e3_phystown e3_phystown_01a e3_seafloor e3_techdemo_6 e3_under_02 e3_under_02b zoo_extras
A lot of the stuff is broken & there’s really no way to fix the leak. That’s why there are mods out there that remake the content with the retail engine.

Read full topic
